roleset.name: group components together to work in coordiation
roleset.note: GANG-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on internet (from gang.01-v)

example.name: args0, 1, 3
example.text: It's as reconfigurable as it-1 is versatile and can be ganged [*-1] together to create modular layouts

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: I ganged them together with blue tape and set up the table saw with a 90 tooth finish blade and the 45 degree cross-cut sled.

roleset.name: gang up (often against), non-phrasal
roleset.note: GANG-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Framenet. (from gang.03-v)

example.name: args 0, 3
example.text: Those who-1 [*-1] have ganged together to fight you will not overcome you!

roleset.name: team up (often against)
roleset.note: GANG_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from gang.02-v)

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Even the police have ganged up with them against me - Please HELP !

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Vietnam is playing with the so - called " Sunshine Law , " and is ganging up with America to lay political siege to other countries . If that can be endured and tolerated , what else can not ?
example.arg: to lay political siege to other countries
